UtIsMatcher
UtMatcher
UtIsMatcher

A NoOp forwarding matcher. Just exists to make assertions read more naturally.

Globals
Functions
ut is
ut is()

A forwarding matcher to help when an "is" would help the assertion read more naturally.

Factory function for UtIsMatcher.

Arguments
matcher

any object

Examples
ut assert that( Expr( 5 + 5 ), ut is( ut equal to( 10 ) ) );
